v-model  v-once

DOM .

// 
directives: {

  // 
  inserted: function (el) {
    el.focus()
    }
  }
}

()

  • bind

  • inserted ()

  • update VNode VNode

  • componentUpdated VNode VNode

  • unbind

  • el DOM
  • binding
    • name v-
    • valuev-my-directive="1 + 1" 2
    • oldValue update componentUpdated
    • expression v-my-directive="1 + 1" "1 + 1"
    • arg v-my-directive:foo "foo"
    • modifiersv-my-directive.foo.bar { foo: true, bar: true }
  • vnodeVue
  • oldVnode update componentUpdated

vue-v-xxx?

vue ,,

  • npm , npm webpack 

# install vue-v-xxx

 npm install vue-v-xxx --save

# or

 yarn add vue-v-xxx --save
  • unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx js css

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.css" />

<script src="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx"></script>

  • main.js,
import Vue from "vue";

import App from "./App";

import Vxxx from "vue-v-xxx";

import "vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.css";

Vue.config.productionTip = false;

Vue.use(Vxxx);

/* eslint-disable no-new */

new Vue({
  el: "#app",

  components: { App },

  template: "<App/>"
});
  • CDN vue-v-xxx 
<!DOCTYPE html>

<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />

    <title>vue-v-xxx</title>

    <link
      rel="stylesheet"
      href="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.css"
    />
  </head>

  <body>
    <div id="app">
      <h1 title="Welcome"> {{ value }}</h1>

      <button v-copy="value">Click me!</button>
    </div>
  </body>

  <!-- import Vue before vue-v-xxx -->

  <script src="https://unpkg.com/vue/dist/vue.js"></script>

  <!-- import JavaScript -->

  <script src="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.umd.js"></script>

  <script>
    new Vue({
      el: "#app",

      data: {
        value: "vue-v-xxx"
      }
    });
  </script>
</html>

?

v-call 

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  div(v-call="tel") 
  div(v-call:sms="10086") 
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-call',
    data() {
      return {
        tel: '10086'
      }
    }
  }
</script>

v-copy 

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  Button(@click="handleClick" v-copy="value") 
  div
    textarea(placeholder="Paste here" style="margin-top:40px;width:100%;height:100%;")
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-copy',
    data() {
      return {
        value: ''
      }
    },
    methods: {
      handleClick(html = ',') {
        this.value = html
      }
    }
  }
</script>

v-debounce

v-debounce v-debounce:500 500ms

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  h1 
  h2 :{{num}}
  Button(@click="addNum") ()
  h1 
  h2 :{{num2}}
  Button(v-debounce="addNum2") ()
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'v-debounce',
  data () {
    return {
      num: 0,
      num2: 0,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    addNum () {
      this.num++
    },
    addNum2 () {
      this.num2++
    }
  }
}
</script>

v-throttle

v-throttle v-throttle:2000 2s

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  h3 :{{num}}
  input(v-model="num")
  h3 :{{num2}}
  input(v-throttle:2000="num2")
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-throttle',
    data() {
      return {
        num: '',
        num2: ''
      }
    }
  }
</script>

v-ellipsis

v-ellipsis ,v-ellipsis

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  div(v-ellipsis) {{des}}
  div(v-ellipsis:3)
    p {{des2}}
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'v-ellipsis',
  data() {
    return {
      des:
        '',
      des2:
        ''
    }
  }
}
</script>

v-pin

v-pin v-pin:left || top left

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  div(v-pin="200") 200px
  div(v-pin:left="300") 300px
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-pin'
  }
</script>

v-focus

v-focus 

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  input(v-focus)
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'v-focus'
}
</script>

v-click-out

v-click-out dom 

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  div(style="border:1px solid red;width:200px;height:200px;" @click="handleClick" v-click-out="handleClickOut") {{name}}
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-click-out',
    data() {
      return {
        name: ''
      }
    },
    methods: {
      handleClick() {
        this.name = ''
      },
      handleClickOut() {
        this.name = ''
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<template lang="pug">

  name: 'hk-button',
  props: {
    type: {
      type: String,

      type: String,
      default: null
    }
  },
  methods: {

    }, 200)

}

import { Debounce } from './../util/debounce'
export default {
  name: 'hk-button',
  props: {
    type: {
      type: String,
      default: 'primary'
    },
    size: {
      type: String,
      default: 'medium'
    },
    tips: {
      type: String,
      default: null
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleClick: Debounce(function (e) {
      this.$emit('click', e)
    }, 200)
  }
}
</script>

/*
 * @describe: ,install

import HkButton from './hk-button'
import HKcard from './hk-card'

const install = Vue => {
  Vue.component(HkButton.name, HkButton)
  Vue.component(HKcard.name, HKcard)
}

if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.Vue) {
  install(window.Vue)
}

export {
  HkButton,
  HKcard
}

export default { install }

    1. Proxy Proxy 

// @param {Object} target 
// @param {Object} handler 
let proxy = new Proxy(target, handler);

  • Proxy

  • Proxy Proxy Proxy(target, handler) target handlder target handler middleware Proxy getsetProxy revoke 

const target = { name: "Billy Bob", age: 15 };
const handler = {
  get(target, key, proxy) {
    const today = new Date();
    console.log(`GET request made for ${key} at ${today}`);
    return Reflect.get(target, key, proxy);
  }
};
const proxy = new Proxy(target, handler);
proxy.name; // => "GET request made for name at Thu Jul 21 2016 15:26:20 GMT+0800 (CST)" // => "Billy Bob"
